DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation effect alter time initiation low molecular weight heparin ( LMWH ) administration pregnancy outcome woman antiphospholipid syndrome ( APS )
DOC.brief_title: Timing Initiation LMWH Administration Pregnant Women With APS
DOC.detailed_description: Women randomly divide two group ; one start Enoxaparin therapy positive pregnancy test establish start Enoxaparin therapy sonographic confirmation fetal cardiac pulsation . In woman , Enoxaparin give dose 40 mg/day subcutaneously therapy continue termination pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman APS diagnose accord revise classification criterion APS 2006 Sydney , Australia Early pregnancy body weight 5090 Kg Women systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) Women active thromboembolic disorder Women history previous thromboembolic disorder
